summary: The customer was considering upgrading their internet service and the customer service agent was able to provide them with information about Contoso Wireless' Pro Plus plan. The Pro Plus plan includes speeds up to 200 Mbps with no data caps, unlimited access to Wi-Fi hotspots, free installation, 24/7 technical support, and a money-back guarantee. The customer service agent also provided information about the installation process and how to upgrade or downgrade plans in the future. Finally, the customer was able to get started on their order right away.
